Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Deception and Dinosaur Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers King Guz's deceptive drowning, Bronto's unusual behavior, and the decision to trade in Bronto at Honest Zog's.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Drowning and Debt
sub_scenes.description: King Guz fakes drowning to avoid debt, leading to a confrontation with Alley.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Tree Bumping Problem
sub_scenes.description: Bronto's clumsy behavior is discussed and diagnosed as old age.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade-in at Honest Zog's
sub_scenes.description: Alley considers trading in Bronto and visits Honest Zog's dealership.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Deal and Bittersweet Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Alley's test drive, the purchase of a new dinosaur, and the emotional farewell to old Bronto.

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Deal
sub_scenes.description: Alley test drives a new dinosaur, leading to a mishap but ultimately securing the deal.

narrative_arcs.title: Considering Dinosaur Size and Taking a Test Drive
Test Drive Mishap and Securing the Deal

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Dinny and New Beginnings
sub_scenes.description: Alley says goodbye to Bronto (Pal) and starts a journey with his new dinosaur.

Major_Arcs.title: Mistaken Identity and Dinosaur Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a dinosaur sale test ride that leads to a mistaken identity and then shifts to Dinny's mistreatment and escape.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Sales and Identity Twist
sub_scenes.description: A dinosaur sales pitch leads to a test ride and a surprising identity reveal.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is mistreated, leading to his escape and a chase.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rejection and Fishing Trip Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Cooola's rejection of Alley's fishing invitation and the subsequent fishing trip's noisy disruptions.

sub_scenes.title: Cooola's Rejection of Fishing Trip
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Cooola fishing, but she refuses, leading to an argument.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Being Taken for Granted

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Disturbance and Noise Complaint
sub_scenes.description: Noisy baiting disrupts a fishing trip, leading to complaints and a silence request.

narrative_arcs.title: The Noisy Baiting and Fishing Disturbance
Confrontation, Silence Request, and Woman Comparison

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry and Cherie's Choice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays romantic rivalry for a woman, Oola, and Cherie's romantic choice between two cavemen.

sub_scenes.title: Oola's Courtship and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Oola is courted by a man, leading to suspicion and observation by another.

sub_scenes.title: Cherie's Choice and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Cherie rejects a muscular caveman in favor of Koko after a jealous outburst.

Major_Arcs.title: Pozy's Romantic Strategy and Comic Failures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Pozy's attempts to win back Cherie using 'romance,' leading to humorous and disastrous results.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Strategy Lesson
sub_scenes.description: Pozy learns about romance as a strategy to win women.

sub_scenes.title: Failed Romantic Gesture with Crocodile
sub_scenes.description: Pozy's attempt at romance backfires spectacularly with a crocodile incident.

Major_Arcs.title: Love Bites and Marital Disputes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc includes a flashback to jealous rage, a humorous finger-biting incident, and various marital conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Koko's Finger Bite Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: A flashback reveals jealous rage, followed by a comical finger-biting incident misinterpreted as cannibalism.

sub_scenes.title: Marital Conflicts and Alley's Romantic Turn
sub_scenes.description: Various marital disputes are depicted, alongside Alley's attempt at romance after learning from a 'Frenchman'.

Major_Arcs.title: The Perils and Lessons of the Twitch Dance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the dangers of the 'Twitch' dance and the dance lessons at Arthur Mugwump Studios.

sub_scenes.title: Dangers of the Twitch Dance
sub_scenes.description: Injuries from the 'Twist' dance are highlighted, along with social pressures to participate.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons at Arthur Mugwump Studios
sub_scenes.description: A clumsy dance lesson at Arthur Mugwump Studios reveals a humorous instructor identity.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dance Studio and the Challenge

Major_Arcs.title: The Humorous Consequences of the Twitch Dance Performance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in a 'Twitch' dance performance, public humiliation, and the unexpected hospitalization of the viewers.

sub_scenes.title: Public Humiliation During Dance
sub_scenes.description: Alley-Oop's 'Twitch' dance performance leads to public mockery.

narrative_arcs.title: Humiliation Through Laughter During the Dance

sub_scenes.title: Unexpected Hospitalization of Viewers
sub_scenes.description: A surprising twist reveals that viewers, not dancers, are injured and hospitalized due to the 'Twitch'.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Mishaps and Romantic Setbacks
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers time travel for historical research, romantic interruptions, and the quest for a kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Plan for Research
sub_scenes.description: Scholars plan to use a time machine to get firsthand info on 16th-century Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking First-Hand Information on Ancient Spain via Time Machine

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude in the Past
sub_scenes.description: Years later, Alley-Oop is found enjoying a romantic time in the past instead of research.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Interruption and Transportation
sub_scenes.description: A kiss attempt is interrupted by time machine activation, transporting Alley-Oop and Oola to the present.

narrative_arcs.title: Persistent Kiss Request and Reluctant Agreement
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
Arrival in the Time Machine and Explanation

sub_scenes.title: Assignment in Spain and Return
sub_scenes.description: Wonmug needs Oola for a Spain assignment, leading to a quick return trip to ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Wonmug's Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Oola's Role

Major_Arcs.title: Serenade Mishap and Matador Mayhem
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a serenade gone wrong, leading to mistaken identity and an unexpected bullfight substitution.

sub_scenes.title: Serenade and Unwanted Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Alley-Oop's serenade in Spain is interrupted by Wonmug, leading to a violent intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Banter

sub_scenes.title: Mistaken Identity and Manager Threat
sub_scenes.description: Intervention leads to mistaken identity of the serenader as a famous matador and a manager's impending arrival.

Major_Arcs.title: The Unconventional Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features an unconventional bullfight with a muscular man substituting for an injured matador.

sub_scenes.title: Contingency Plan for Bullfight
sub_scenes.description: Due to Don Jose's injury, a contingency plan is made to use a muscular man as a matador substitute.

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Bullfight Performance and Victory
sub_scenes.description: The muscular man enters the arena and wins the bullfight using unconventional methods.

Major_Arcs.title: Return from Spain and Romantic Disappointment
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Oop's return from Spain, a promised kiss, and its humorous interruption due to jealousy.

sub_scenes.title: Anticipation of Return and Reward
sub_scenes.description: Anticipation builds for Oop's return and a promised kiss reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Bravery in Spain and a Kiss Promise

sub_scenes.title: Rescue, Interruption, and Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Oop's rescue leads to an interrupted kiss and an accusation of infidelity.

Major_Arcs.title: The Ironic Reign of the Temporary King
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the brief and ironically chaotic reign of a temporary king, and the original king's manipulative return to power.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Introduction and Transfer
sub_scenes.description: The concept of 'King for a Day' is introduced, and a temporary king is appointed.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day Introduction and Initial Rule

sub_scenes.title: Ironic Interpretation of Respect and Backlash
sub_scenes.description: The crowned king's instruction for 'respect' is misinterpreted as rock-throwing.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Original King's Return
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king retreats, and the original king returns to power, revealing his manipulation.

Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Domestic Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays King Guz's humorous domestic issues, including mistaken pills and dirty feet.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Pills Mistaken for Bon-Bons
sub_scenes.description: King Guz mistakenly eats ulcer pills, thinking they are bon-bons.

sub_scenes.title: Dirty Feet and Broom Attack
sub_scenes.description: Queen Oompa scolds King Guz for dirty feet, leading to a broom attack and forced foot washing.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Foot Washing and Vacation Justification

Major_Arcs.title: Resolving the Clam Dispute
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases the resolution of a clam dispute with the help of a wise old caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Multiple Disputes and Clam Theft
sub_scenes.description: Multiple disputes break out, including one over found clams.

sub_scenes.title: Wise Man's Intervention and True Owner
sub_scenes.description: A wise man intervenes to resolve the clam dispute, revealing the true owner.

Major_Arcs.title: King's Day of Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a day full of troubles for the king, including a brawl, financial disputes, and displeasing food.

sub_scenes.title: Outdoor Brawl
sub_scenes.description: A brawl breaks out outside the palace, involving the king.

sub_scenes.title: Financial Dispute with Advisor
sub_scenes.description: The king has a financial disagreement with his advisor.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer-Aggravating Dinner
sub_scenes.description: Dinner is served, but it displeases the king due to his ulcer.

Major_Arcs.title: King's Ulcer Diet and Temper
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the king's strict ulcer diet and his violent reaction to a playful servant.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Diet Compliance
sub_scenes.description: The king's ulcer diet is discussed and enforced by the queen.

sub_scenes.title: Playful Interruption and Violent Retaliation
sub_scenes.description: A playful servant interrupts the king, leading to a violent reaction.

Major_Arcs.title: Job Stress, Rulership, and Duck Measurement
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc includes themes of job stress, relief from rulership, and a bizarre duck measurement.

sub_scenes.title: Job Stress and Forgiveness
sub_scenes.description: Job stress is implied in an apology and forgiveness scene.

sub_scenes.title: Relief from Rulership
sub_scenes.description: A caveman expresses relief at no longer being a ruler.

sub_scenes.title: Offer of Rulership
sub_scenes.description: An offer of rulership is made to another caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Strange Duck Measurement
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen engage in a bizarre measurement activity related to a 'Strange Duck'.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Prophecy and Unwanted Shave
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contrasts romantic prophecy with the harsh reality of a forced shave for the 'handsome stranger'.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Prophecy at the Wizer
sub_scenes.description: A woman excitedly recounts a romantic prophecy about a handsome stranger.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Shaving at the Tonsorial Parlor
sub_scenes.description: The 'handsome stranger' is forcefully taken to a tonsorial parlor and shaved.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a time machine experiment that goes wrong, resulting in a Roman soldier appearing instead of 'Oop'.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Intention
sub_scenes.description: A man sets up his time machine intending to bring 'Oop' to the present.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Roman Arrival
sub_scenes.description: The time machine malfunctions, and a Roman soldier materializes instead of 'Oop'.
